instructions.reason_for_call: You want to return the speaker that is more expensive yet not resistent to water. Also, You want to modify the 17-inch laptop to the 13-inch version in another order. If no exact item is available, you want to know all available 13-inch options, and you prefer i5 over i7, and prefer silver and black than other colors.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

I want to return a speaker I bought. It's more expensive but not water-resistant, which is ridiculous. Also, I have another order with a 17-inch laptop, and I want to change it to a 13-inch version. If you don't have the exact one, just tell me all the 13-inch options you have. I prefer i5 processors over i7, and I want silver or black colors, nothing else.

message.content: I want to return a speaker I bought. It's more expensive but not water-resistant, which is ridiculous. Also, I have another order with a 17-inch laptop, and I want to change it to a 13-inch version. If you don't have the exact one, just tell me all the 13-inch options you have. I prefer i5 processors over i7, and I want silver or black colors, nothing else.
